mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS keywordCount, SUM(AGREE_COUNT) AS sumAgreeCount, MAX(AGREE_COUNT) AS maxAgreeCount FROM post_keyword pk INNER JOIN post p ON pk.post_id = p.post_id WHERE pk.keyword = #{keyword} AND p.is_new = #{isNew};

SELECT p.post_id, p.category_id, p.title, p.is_new, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.agree_count FROM post_keyword pk INNER JOIN post p ON pk.post_id = p.post_id WHERE pk.keyword = #{keyword} ORDER BY start_date DESC;
